movies.title: Ding et Dong le film
movies.plot: Two harum-scarums who think they are good stand-up comics try to make a career in showbiz, partly for the career, partly to seduce women. They try alternatively the scene, a movie set and TV. They only succeed in making a fool of themselves.
movies.simplePlot: Two harum-scarums who think they are good stand-up comics try to make a career in showbiz, partly for the career, partly to seduce women. They try alternatively the scene, a movie set and ...

biography.bio: Serge Thériault was born on April 23, 1948 in Quebec City, Quebec, Canada. He is an actor, known for La petite vie (1993), Gaz Bar Blues (2003) and Ding et Dong le film (1990).
biography.name: Serge Thériault

biography.bio: Claude Meunier was born on September 4, 1951. He is a writer and actor, known for La petite vie (1993), Ding et Dong le film (1990) and Le grand départ (2008). He was previously married to Marie-Claude Goodwin.
biography.name: Claude Meunier

biography.bio: Raymond Bouchard was born on March 7, 1945 in Lauzon, Quebec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Seducing Doctor Lewis (2003), La vie avec mon père (2005) and Absolute Race (2007).
biography.name: Raymond Bouchard

biography.bio: Sophie Faucher was born on April 10, 1958. She is an actress, known for Laurence Anyways (2012), Le coeur a ses raisons (2005) and La face cachée de la lune (2003).
biography.name: Sophie Faucher

biography.bio: Yves Jacques was born on May 10, 1956 in Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Aviator (2004), The Barbarian Invasions (2003) and Laurence Anyways (2012).
biography.name: Yves Jacques

biography.bio: Jean Lapointe was born on December 6, 1935. He is an actor, known for Le dernier tunnel (2004), Une histoire inventée (1990) and Orderers (1974).
biography.name: Jean Lapointe

biography.bio: Denis Bouchard was born on October 9, 1953 in Québec, Canada. He is an actor and writer, known for The Barbarian Invasions (2003), The Little Queen (2014) and Les matins infidèles (1988).
biography.name: Denis Bouchard

biography.bio: René Homier-Roy was born on April 5, 1940. He is an actor, known for Ding et Dong le film (1990), État critique (1992) and Adam & Ève (2012).
biography.name: René Homier-Roy

biography.bio: Marie-France Lambert is an actress, known for Starbuck (2011), Maelstrom (2000) and Audition (2005).
biography.name: Marie-France Lambert

biography.bio: Élyse Marquis was born on June 26, 1968 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Le polock (1999), Ding et Dong le film (1990) and Cauchemar d'amour (2001).
biography.name: Élyse Marquis

biography.bio: André Montmorency was born on May 30, 1939 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. He was an actor and director, known for Mars et Avril (2012), Il était une fois dans l'est (1974) and Histoires d'hiver (1999). He died on July 5, 2016 in Montréal.
biography.name: André Montmorency

biography.bio: Yves Pelletier was born on January 15, 1961 in Laval, Québec, Canada. He is an actor and writer, known for Karmina (1996), Karmina 2 (2001) and Rock et Belles Oreilles: The DVD 1994-95 (2001).
biography.name: Yves Pelletier

biography.bio: Anne Dorval was born in Noranda, Quebec on November 8th, 1960. Since appearing in her first professional theatre role in 1985, she has acted in numerous theatre productions, films, and television series'. Anne has won multiple awards for her work in theatre, film, and television. Anne is also a prominent dubbing actress in Quebec, and has done the voices of many famous English-speaking actresses. In addition to acting, Anne is a talented singer. She has performed in songs on multiple albums. Outside of Quebec, Anne is most known for her collaborations with director Xavier Dolan. Xavier was a big fan of Anne's and asked her to be in his first movie, and since then they have collaborated many times and have become close friends. Anne now lives in Montreal with her two children.
biography.name: Anne Dorval

biography.bio: Claude Laroche is an actor, known for Les Bougon: C'est aussi ça la vie (2004), Waterfront Dreams (2002) and Le crime d'Ovide Plouffe (1984).
biography.name: Claude Laroche

biography.bio: Jean Pierre Bergeron was born in Jonquière, Québec, Canada. He is an actor and director, known for Prom Queen (2004), Henri Henri (2014) and L'eau chaude, l'eau frette (1976).
biography.name: Jean Pierre Bergeron

laboratory: Bellevue Pathé Québec Inc., Montreal, Canada
